item.title: 中美有望达成协议，大豆期货创八周新高
item.description: 由于市场对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平即将举行的会晤可能取得突破的乐观情绪日益高涨，大豆价格连续第四天扩大涨幅。【原文：Soybean prices extended their gains for a fourth consecutive day as markets grew increasingly optimistic about a potential breakthrough at the upcoming meeting between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 中国在大型会议上向外企保证出口管制
item.description: 中国召开了一次不同寻常的大型外商会议，向外商保证新的出口管制措施并不是为了限制正常贸易，因为决策者们正试图平息对这一决定的反弹。【原文：China convened an unusually large meeting with foreign businesses in an effort to reassure them its new export controls aren’t meant to restrict normal trade, as policymakers seek to calm a backlash over the decision.】

item.title: 惠誉预计南非下月将实现 3% 的通胀目标
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）预计，南非国家财政部将于下月正式把该国的通胀目标下调至 3%，以认可央行在 7 月份通过的这一目标。【原文：Fitch Ratings expects South Africa’s National Treasury to formally lower the nation’s inflation target to 3% next month, endorsing the central bank’s adoption of the goal in July.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行称苏丹裁决对股票造成的打击是孤立的
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）重申其观点，即最近导致股价暴跌的一项法院裁决不适用于其他案件，以努力遏制法律上的不确定性。【原文：BNP Paribas SA reiterated its view that a recent court ruling, which had led to a stock price plunge, doesn’t apply to other cases, in an effort to contain legal uncertainty.】

item.title: 贝森特确认与阿根廷达成 "经济稳定 "协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，美国政府已与阿根廷中央银行达成 "经济稳定 "协议。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Tuesday the US government had completed “an economic stabilization” accord with Argentina’s central bank.】

item.title: 投资者冲突加剧，巴伐利亚竞购者降低收购门槛
item.description: 北欧资本（Nordic Capital）和 Permira 第二次降低了对巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）收购要约的接受程度，加大力度绕过股东反对，确保交易成功。【原文：Nordic Capital and Permira lowered the acceptance level of their Bavarian Nordic A/S takeover bid for the second time, stepping up efforts to bypass shareholder opposition and secure the deal.】

item.title: Blackstone 和 TPG 同意以 180 亿美元收购 Hologic
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和 TPG Inc. 同意以高达 183 亿美元（包括债务）的价格收购医疗设备制造商 Hologic Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. and TPG Inc. agreed to acquire medical-device maker Hologic Inc. for as much as $18.3 billion, including debt, as private equity dealmaking accelerates in a bumper M&A market.】

item.title: Vanguard 将 14 亿美元的 S&P 基金纳入投资者代理计划
item.description: 先锋集团（Vanguard Group）正在扩大其代理投票计划（旨在让股东对所投资公司的公司决议有更大的发言权），以增加该投资巨头历史最悠久的指数基金。【原文：Vanguard Group is expanding its proxy voting program — designed to give shareholders a greater say on corporate resolutions at portfolio companies — to add the investment giant’s oldest index fund.】

item.title: 沃勒欢迎美联储进入支付 "新时代
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，该机构将更加积极地研究如何拥抱支付领域的创新进步。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller says the agency will be more active in studying ways to embrace innovative advancements in payments.】

item.title: 跌宕起伏的市场让新兴市场货币比发达国家货币更平静
item.description: 新兴市场本应比发达市场更不稳定。但在货币方面，今年的情况却发生了翻天覆地的变化。【原文：Emerging markets are supposed to be far more volatile than developed ones. But in currencies, that’s been turned upside down this year.】

item.title: LME 库存枯竭，锌面临几十年来最大挤压
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所锌市场正面临着数十年来最严重的挤压，因为交易商们急于获得支撑交易所合约的越来越少的库存。【原文：The London Metal Exchange zinc market is facing the most severe squeeze in decades as traders rush to get hold of a dwindling volume of inventory underpinning contracts on the bourse.】

item.title: 加拿大通胀率升至 2.4%，核心指标升温
item.description: 加拿大 9 月份的总体通胀率升至 2.4%，高于预期，核心指标也有所升温，这可能使加拿大央行有理由在下周的利率决议前保持谨慎。【原文：Canada’s headline inflation rate rose more than expected in September to 2.4% and core measures heated up, likely giving the Bank of Canada some reason for caution ahead of next week’s rate decision.】

item.title: 新电池厂将为宾夕法尼亚州数据中心提供更多电力
item.description: 电池制造商 Eos Energy Enterprises 公司正在开发一座耗资 7500 万美元的工厂，预计将帮助电力公司 Talen Energy Corp. 为宾夕法尼亚州不断增长的数据中心提供电力。【原文：Battery manufacturer Eos Energy Enterprises Inc. is developing a $75 million factory that it expects will help power firm Talen Energy Corp. feed Pennsylvania’s growing data centers.】

item.title: 贝莱德将比特币 "鲸鱼 "拉入华尔街轨道
item.description: 比特币的大持有者正在把他们的财富从区块链转移到华尔街的资产负债表上。【原文：Big Bitcoin holders are moving their wealth from the blockchain onto Wall Street’s balance sheet.】

item.title: 匈牙利顶住欧尔班的压力，维持关键利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利央行连续第 13 个月维持欧盟最高借贷成本不变，回绝了政府关于开始货币宽松政策的呼吁。【原文：Hungary’s central bank left the European Union’s highest borrowing costs unchanged for a 13th month, rebuffing government calls to start monetary easing.】

item.title: 切斯基称 OpenAI 工具尚未准备好与 Airbnb 应用程序进行 ChatGPT 合作
item.description: Airbnb Inc.首席执行官布莱恩-切斯基（Brian Chesky）说，他之所以没有将公司的在线旅行应用与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 整合，是因为这家初创公司的连接工具还 "没有准备好"。【原文：Airbnb Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Chesky said he didn’t integrate his company’s online travel app with OpenAI’s ChatGPT because the startup’s connective tools aren’t “quite ready” yet.】

item.title: CenterPoint 将以 26 亿美元出售俄亥俄州天然气业务
item.description: CenterPoint Energy Inc. 同意以 26 亿美元的价格将其俄亥俄州天然气公用事业出售给 National Fuel Gas Company。【原文：CenterPoint Energy Inc. agreed to sell its Ohio natural gas utility to National Fuel Gas Company for $2.6 billion.】

item.title: 菲利浦-莫里斯就 Zyn 胶袋的受欢迎程度发布指导意见
item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International Inc.【原文：Philip Morris International Inc. nudged up the bottom end of its outlook for this fiscal year off the back of strong demand for its smoke-free products, including Zyn nicotine pouches.】

item.title: 所罗门称地区银行损失为 "偶发事件
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）说。【原文：A string of losses at regional banks tied to alleged fraud were isolated incidents, but should be viewed as a reminder to be vigilant about underwriting standards, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer David Solomon said.】

item.title: 调查威胁加剧债务困境，Novaland 股价暴跌
item.description: 诺瓦兰投资集团（Novaland Investment Group）股价连续第二天暴跌，原因是警方可能会对涉嫌虚报债券销售的行为展开调查，这给这家已经在努力偿还债务的负债累累的开发商带来了更大的压力。【原文：Novaland Investment Group shares tumbled for a second day as a potential police investigation into alleged misreported bond sales added to pressure on the debt-laden developer already struggling to meet repayments.】

item.title: MEG 推迟塞纳维斯会议，称交易仍未获投票通过
item.description: 石油生产商 MEG Energy Corp. 推迟了对加拿大竞争对手 Cenovus Energy Inc.【原文：Oil producer MEG Energy Corp. postponed its planned shareholder vote on a takeover offer from Canadian rival Cenovus Energy Inc., saying it’s still just short of the support it needs for the deal to pass.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油运输量接近入侵后最高水平
item.description:
截至10月19日的四周内，资金流动量升至29个月以来的新高

。【原文：

Flows rose to a 29-month high in the four weeks to Oct. 19

】

item.title: 美国公司在缺乏经济数据的情况下提供乐观信息
item.description: 本周二，在缺乏强劲数据或看涨评论的情况下，投资者在寻找一些积极的经济指标时得到了他们想要的东西，美国一些最大的运输、消费和工业巨头纷纷上调展望，预示着乐观的前景。【原文：Investors looking for some positive economic indicators in the absence of strong data or bullish commentary got what they were looking for on Tuesday with a slew of outlook hikes that augur optimism from some of the US’s biggest transport, consumer and industrial titans.】

item.title: 洛克希德公司因销售强劲而减少现金消耗
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.【原文：Lockheed Martin Corp. reported earnings that were better than analysts’ expectations as the world’s largest defense contractor works to improve execution on the delay-riddled F-35 fighter and other key weapons programs.】

item.title: 泰国总理要求副总理解释诈骗关联指控
item.description: 泰国总理阿努廷-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）表示，他已要求财政部副部长沃拉帕-坦亚翁（Vorapak Tanyawong）就有关他与东南亚诈骗网络有关联的指控作出书面回应。【原文：Thailand’s Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul said he’s asked Deputy Finance Minister Vorapak Tanyawong for a written response to allegations that he’s linked to Southeast Asian scam networks.】

item.title: 中国海上风电企业勇往直前，西方企业却节节败退
item.description:
一旦行业恢复增长，各公司都将自身定位为抢占新业务。【原文：

Companies are positioning themselves to seize new business once the industry returns to growth.

】

item.title: 走在中美之间的钢丝绳上
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注澳大利亚的稀土外交。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Australia’s rare earths diplomacy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 收益抵消债务担忧，法国股市再创新高
item.description: 由于强劲的企业盈利抵消了人们对该国政治动荡和信贷前景的担忧，法国股市升破了 2024 年 5 月的收盘纪录高点。【原文：French stocks rose above a May 2024 record closing high as strong corporate earnings offset concerns about the country’s political turmoil and its credit outlook.】

item.title: 斯帕克、科斯拉和红杉支持将人工智能引入税收征管的初创公司
item.description: 投资者正将赌注押在新的软件工具上，以解决商业和生活中最棘手的问题之一--税收。【原文：Investors are betting on new software tools to grapple with one of the thorniest problems in business and life — taxes.】

item.title: 中国的港口优势为其经济影响力增添战略筹码
item.description: 中国花费 20 年时间建立了一个遍布全球的港口网络，为其提供了商业影响力和潜在的战略杠杆。【原文：China has spent two decades building a globe-spanning port network that offers it commercial reach — and potential strategic leverage.】
